Noble-Package
================

<!-- README.md is generated from README.Rmd. Please edit that file -->
<!-- ****** Description ****** -->
This repository is for housing the Noble package, used in TIS, AIS and MDP commissioning. Noble contains functions used in downloading, plotting, and quality checking data. 

<!-- ****** Usage ****** -->
Usage
-----
Right now, the repository is closed to collaboration. However, the latest stable build can be installed from this repo by:
1. Downloading the Noble_0.#.#.tar.gz file located at the top level of the repo (don't uncompress!)
1. Run `install.packages(file.choose(), repos = NULL, type="source")` in the R console.
1. Locate the saved Noble source package in the file navigation window that opens, and open it.
1. Wait for installation to complete.
